member.name: T:Amazon.GeoMaps.AmazonGeoMapsDefaultConfiguration
member.summary: Configuration for accessing Amazon GeoMaps service

member.name: M:Amazon.GeoMaps.AmazonGeoMapsDefaultConfiguration.GetAllConfigurations
member.summary: Collection of all s supported by GeoMaps

summary.p: The STANDARD mode provides the latest recommended default values that should be safe to run in most scenarios
Note that the default values vended from this mode might change as best practices may evolve. As a result, it is encouraged to perform tests when upgrading the SDK
The IN_REGION mode builds on the standard mode and includes optimization tailored for applications which call AWS services from within the same AWS region
Note that the default values vended from this mode might change as best practices may evolve. As a result, it is encouraged to perform tests when upgrading the SDK
The CROSS_REGION mode builds on the standard mode and includes optimization tailored for applications which call AWS services in a different region
Note that the default values vended from this mode might change as best practices may evolve. As a result, it is encouraged to perform tests when upgrading the SDK
The MOBILE mode builds on the standard mode and includes optimization tailored for mobile applications
Note that the default values vended from this mode might change as best practices may evolve. As a result, it is encouraged to perform tests when upgrading the SDK
The AUTO mode is an experimental mode that builds on the standard mode. The SDK will attempt to discover the execution environment to determine the appropriate settings automatically.

Note that the auto detection is heuristics-based and does not guarantee 100% accuracy. STANDARD mode will be used if the execution environment cannot be determined. The auto detection might query EC2 Instance Metadata service, which might introduce latency. Therefore we recommend choosing an explicit defaults_mode instead if startup latency is critical to your application
The LEGACY mode provides default settings that vary per SDK and were used prior to establishment of defaults_mode

member.name: T:Amazon.GeoMaps.Internal.AmazonGeoMapsEndpointProvider
member.summary: Amazon GeoMaps endpoint provider. Resolves endpoint for given set of GeoMapsEndpointParameters. Can throw AmazonClientException if endpoint resolution is unsuccessful.

member.name: M:Amazon.GeoMaps.Internal.AmazonGeoMapsEndpointProvider.ResolveEndpoint(Amazon.Runtime.Endpoints.EndpointParameters)
member.summary: Resolve endpoint for GeoMapsEndpointParameters

member.name: T:Amazon.GeoMaps.Internal.AmazonGeoMapsEndpointResolver
member.summary: Amazon GeoMaps endpoint resolver. Custom PipelineHandler responsible for resolving endpoint and setting authentication parameters for GeoMaps service requests. Collects values for GeoMapsEndpointParameters and then tries to resolve endpoint by calling ResolveEndpoint method on GlobalEndpoints.Provider if present, otherwise uses GeoMapsEndpointProvider. Responsible for setting authentication and http headers provided by resolved endpoint.

member.name: T:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetGlyphsRequest
member.summary: Container for the parameters to the GetGlyphs operation. Returns the map's glyphs.

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetGlyphsRequest.FontStack
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property FontStack.
Name of the FontStack to retrieve.
Example: Amazon Ember Bold,Noto Sans Bold.
The supported font stacks are as follows:
Amazon Ember Bold
Amazon Ember Bold Italic
Amazon Ember Bold,Noto Sans Bold
Amazon Ember Bold,Noto Sans Bold,Noto Sans Arabic Bold
Amazon Ember Condensed RC BdItalic
Amazon Ember Condensed RC Bold

Amazon Ember Condensed RC Light
Amazon Ember Condensed RC Light Italic
Amazon Ember Condensed RC LtItalic
Amazon Ember Condensed RC Regular
Amazon Ember Condensed RC Regular Italic
Amazon Ember Condensed RC Regular,Noto Sans Regular
Amazon Ember Condensed RC Regular,Noto Sans Regular,Noto Sans Arabic Condensed Regular
Amazon Ember Condensed RC RgItalic
Amazon Ember Condensed RC ThItalic
Amazon Ember Condensed RC Thin
Amazon Ember Condensed RC Thin Italic
Amazon Ember Heavy
Amazon Ember Heavy Italic
Amazon Ember Light
Amazon Ember Light Italic
Amazon Ember Medium
Amazon Ember Medium Italic
Amazon Ember Medium,Noto Sans Medium
Amazon Ember Medium,Noto Sans Medium,Noto Sans Arabic Medium
Amazon Ember Regular
Amazon Ember Regular Italic
Amazon Ember Regular Italic,Noto Sans Italic
Amazon Ember Regular Italic,Noto Sans Italic,Noto Sans Arabic Regular
Amazon Ember Regular,Noto Sans Regular
Amazon Ember Regular,Noto Sans Regular,Noto Sans Arabic Regular
Amazon Ember Thin
Amazon Ember Thin Italic
AmazonEmberCdRC_Bd
AmazonEmberCdRC_BdIt
AmazonEmberCdRC_Lt
AmazonEmberCdRC_LtIt
AmazonEmberCdRC_Rg
AmazonEmberCdRC_RgIt
AmazonEmberCdRC_Th
AmazonEmberCdRC_ThIt
AmazonEmber_Bd
AmazonEmber_BdIt
AmazonEmber_He
AmazonEmber_HeIt
AmazonEmber_Lt
AmazonEmber_LtIt
AmazonEmber_Md
AmazonEmber_MdIt
AmazonEmber_Rg
AmazonEmber_RgIt
AmazonEmber_Th
AmazonEmber_ThIt
Noto Sans Black
Noto Sans Black Italic
Noto Sans Bold
Noto Sans Bold Italic
Noto Sans Extra Bold
Noto Sans Extra Bold Italic
Noto Sans Extra Light
Noto Sans Extra Light Italic
Noto Sans Italic
Noto Sans Light
Noto Sans Light Italic

Noto Sans Medium Italic
Noto Sans Regular
Noto Sans Semi Bold
Noto Sans Semi Bold Italic

Noto Sans Thin Italic

Open Sans Regular,Arial Unicode MS Regular

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetGlyphsRequest.FontUnicodeRange
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property FontUnicodeRange.
A Unicode range of characters to download glyphs for. This must be aligned to multiples of 256.
Example: 0-255.pdf

member.name: T:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetSpritesRequest
member.summary: Container for the parameters to the GetSprites operation. Returns the map's sprites.

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetSpritesRequest.ColorScheme
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property ColorScheme.
Sets color tone for map such as dark and light for specific map styles. It applies to only vector map styles such as Standard and Monochrome.
Example: Light
Default value: Light
Valid values for ColorScheme are case sensitive.

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetSpritesRequest.FileName
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property FileName.
Sprites API: The name of the sprite ﬁle to retrieve, following pattern sprites(@2x)?\.(png|json).
Example: sprites.png

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetSpritesRequest.Style
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Style.
Style specifies the desired map style for the Sprites APIs.

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetSpritesRequest.Variant
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Variant.
Optimizes map styles for specific use case or industry. You can choose allowed variant only with Standard map style.
Example: Default
Valid values for Variant are case sensitive.

member.name: T:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetSpritesResponse
member.summary: This is the response object from the GetSprites operation.

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetSpritesResponse.Blob
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Blob.
The body of the sprite sheet or JSON offset file (image/png or application/json, depending on input).

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetSpritesResponse.CacheControl
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property CacheControl.
Header that instructs caching configuration for the client.

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetSpritesResponse.ContentType
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property ContentType.
Header that represents the format of the response. The response returns the following as the HTTP body.

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetSpritesResponse.ETag
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property ETag.
The sprite's Etag.

member.name: T:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetStaticMapRequest
member.summary: Container for the parameters to the GetStaticMap operation. Provides high-quality static map images with customizable options. You can modify the map's appearance and overlay additional information. It's an ideal solution for applications requiring tailored static map snapshots.

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetStaticMapRequest.BoundedPositions
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property BoundedPositions.
Takes in two or more pair of coordinates, [Lon, Lat], with each coordinate separated by a comma. The API will generate an image to encompass all of the provided coordinates.
Cannot be used with Zoom and or Radius
Example: 97.170451,78.039098,99.045536,27.176178

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetStaticMapRequest.BoundingBox
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property BoundingBox.
Takes in two pairs of coordinates, [Lon, Lat], denoting south-westerly and north-easterly edges of the image. The underlying area becomes the view of the image.
Example: -123.17075,49.26959,-123.08125,49.31429

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetStaticMapRequest.Center
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Center.
Takes in a pair of coordinates, [Lon, Lat], which becomes the center point of the image. This parameter requires that either zoom or radius is set.
Cannot be used with Zoom and or Radius
Example: 49.295,-123.108

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetStaticMapRequest.CompactOverlay
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property CompactOverlay.
Takes in a string to draw geometries on the image. The input is a comma separated format as follows format: [Lon, Lat]
Example: line:-122.407653,37.798557,-122.413291,37.802443;color=%23DD0000;width=7;outline-color=#00DD00;outline-width=5yd|point:-122.40572,37.80004;label=Fog Hill Market;size=large;text-color=%23DD0000;color=#EE4B2B
Currently it supports the following geometry types: point, line and polygon. It does not support multiPoint , multiLine and multiPolgyon.

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetStaticMapRequest.FileName
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property FileName.
The map scaling parameter to size the image, icons, and labels. It follows the pattern of ^map(@2x)?$.
Example: map, map@2x

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetStaticMapRequest.GeoJsonOverlay
P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetStaticMapRequest.Height
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Height.
Specifies the height of the map image.

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetStaticMapRequest.Key
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Key.
Optional: The API key to be used for authorization. Either an API key or valid SigV4 signature must be provided when making a request.

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetStaticMapRequest.Padding
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Padding.
Applies additional space (in pixels) around overlay feature to prevent them from being cut or obscured.
Value for max and min is determined by:
Min: 1
Max: min(height, width)/4
Example: 100

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetStaticMapRequest.Radius
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Radius.
Used with center parameter, it specifies the zoom of the image where you can control it on a granular level. Takes in any value >= 1.
Example: 1500
Cannot be used with Zoom.
Unit: Meters

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetStaticMapRequest.ScaleBarUnit
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property ScaleBarUnit.
Displays a scale on the bottom right of the map image with the unit specified in the input.
Example: KilometersMiles, Miles, Kilometers, MilesKilometers

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetStaticMapRequest.Style
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Style.
Style specifies the desired map style for the Style APIs.

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetStaticMapRequest.Width
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Width.
Specifies the width of the map image.

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetStaticMapRequest.Zoom
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Zoom.
Specifies the zoom level of the map image.
Cannot be used with Radius.

member.name: T:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetStaticMapResponse
member.summary: This is the response object from the GetStaticMap operation.

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetStaticMapResponse.Blob
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Blob.
The blob represents a map image as a jpeg for the GetStaticMap API.

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetStaticMapResponse.CacheControl
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property CacheControl.
Header that instructs caching configuration for the client.

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetStaticMapResponse.ContentType
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property ContentType.
Header that represents the format of the response. The response returns the following as the HTTP body.

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetStaticMapResponse.ETag
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property ETag.
The static map's Etag.

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetStaticMapResponse.PricingBucket
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property PricingBucket.
The pricing bucket for which the request is charged at.

member.name: T:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetStyleDescriptorRequest
member.summary: Container for the parameters to the GetStyleDescriptor operation. Returns information about the style.

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetStyleDescriptorRequest.ColorScheme
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property ColorScheme.
Sets color tone for map such as dark and light for specific map styles. It applies to only vector map styles such as Standard and Monochrome.
Example: Light
Default value: Light
Valid values for ColorScheme are case sensitive.

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetStyleDescriptorRequest.Key
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Key.
Optional: The API key to be used for authorization. Either an API key or valid SigV4 signature must be provided when making a request.

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetStyleDescriptorRequest.PoliticalView
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property PoliticalView.
Specifies the political view using ISO 3166-2 or ISO 3166-3 country code format.
The following political views are currently supported:
ARG: Argentina's view on the Southern Patagonian Ice Field and Tierra Del Fuego, including the Falkland Islands, South Georgia, and South Sandwich Islands
EGY: Egypt's view on Bir Tawil
IND: India's view on Gilgit-Baltistan
KEN: Kenya's view on the Ilemi Triangle
MAR: Morocco's view on Western Sahara
PAK: Pakistan's view on Jammu and Kashmir and the Junagadh Area
RUS: Russia's view on Crimea
SDN: Sudan's view on the Halaib Triangle
SRB: Serbia's view on Kosovo, Vukovar, and Sarengrad Islands
SUR: Suriname's view on the Courantyne Headwaters and Lawa Headwaters
SYR: Syria's view on the Golan Heights
TUR: Turkey's view on Cyprus and Northern Cyprus
TZA: Tanzania's view on Lake Malawi
URY: Uruguay's view on Rincon de Artigas
VNM: Vietnam's view on the Paracel Islands and Spratly Islands

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetStyleDescriptorRequest.Style
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Style.
Style specifies the desired map style.

member.name: T:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetTileRequest
member.summary: Container for the parameters to the GetTile operation. Returns a tile. Map tiles are used by clients to render a map. they're addressed using a grid arrangement with an X coordinate, Y coordinate, and Z (zoom) level.

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetTileRequest.Key
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Key.
Optional: The API key to be used for authorization. Either an API key or valid SigV4 signature must be provided when making a request.

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetTileRequest.Tileset
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Tileset.
Specifies the desired tile set.
Valid Values: raster.satellite | vector.basemap

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetTileRequest.X
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property X.
The X axis value for the map tile. Must be between 0 and 19.

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetTileRequest.Y
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Y.
The Y axis value for the map tile.

member.name: P:Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetTileRequest.Z
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Z.
The zoom value for the map tile.

member.summary:

The blob represents a vector tile in mvt format for the GetTile API.

member.summary:
Gets and sets the property CacheControl.
Header that instructs caching configuration for the client.

member.summary:
Gets and sets the property ContentType.
Header that represents the format of the response. The response returns the following as the HTTP body.

member.name: T:Amazon.GeoMaps.AmazonGeoMapsClient
member.summary:
Implementation for accessing GeoMaps
Integrate high-quality base map data into your applications using MapLibre. Capabilities include:
Access to comprehensive base map data, allowing you to tailor the map display to your specific needs.
Multiple pre-designed map styles suited for various application types, such as navigation, logistics, or data visualization.
Generation of static map images for scenarios where interactive maps aren't suitable, such as:
Embedding in emails or documents
Displaying in low-bandwidth environments
Creating printable maps
Enhancing application performance by reducing client-side rendering

member.name: M:Amazon.GeoMaps.AmazonGeoMapsClient.#ctor
member.summary:
Constructs AmazonGeoMapsClient with the credentials loaded from the application's default configuration, and if unsuccessful from the Instance Profile service on an EC2 instance.
Example App.config with credentials set.
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <configuration> <appSettings> <add key="AWSProfileName" value="AWS Default"/> </appSettings> </configuration>

member.name: M:Amazon.GeoMaps.AmazonGeoMapsClient.#ctor(Amazon.RegionEndpoint)
member.summary:
Constructs AmazonGeoMapsClient with the credentials loaded from the application's default configuration, and if unsuccessful from the Instance Profile service on an EC2 instance.
Example App.config with credentials set.
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <configuration> <appSettings> <add key="AWSProfileName" value="AWS Default"/> </appSettings> </configuration>
member.param: The region to connect.

member.name: M:Amazon.GeoMaps.AmazonGeoMapsClient.GetStaticMapAsync(Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetStaticMapRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Provides high-quality static map images with customizable options. You can modify the map's appearance and overlay additional information. It's an ideal solution for applications requiring tailored static map snapshots.
member.param: Container for the necessary parameters to execute the GetStaticMap service method.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: The response from the GetStaticMap service method, as returned by GeoMaps.
member.exception: The request was denied because of insufficient access or permissions. Check with an administrator to verify your permissions.
The request processing has failed because of an unknown error, exception or failure.
The request was denied due to request throttling.
The input fails to satisfy the constraints specified by an AWS service.
member.seealso: REST API Reference for GetStaticMap Operation

member.name: M:Amazon.GeoMaps.AmazonGeoMapsClient.GetTileAsync(Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetTileRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns a tile. Map tiles are used by clients to render a map. they're addressed using a grid arrangement with an X coordinate, Y coordinate, and Z (zoom) level.
member.param: Container for the necessary parameters to execute the GetTile service method.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: The response from the GetTile service method, as returned by GeoMaps.
member.exception: The request was denied because of insufficient access or permissions. Check with an administrator to verify your permissions.
The request processing has failed because of an unknown error, exception or failure.
The request was denied due to request throttling.
The input fails to satisfy the constraints specified by an AWS service.

member.summary: Returns the endpoint that will be used for a particular request.
member.param: Request for the desired service operation.

member.name: T:Amazon.GeoMaps.IAmazonGeoMaps
member.summary:
Interface for accessing GeoMaps
Integrate high-quality base map data into your applications using MapLibre. Capabilities include:
Access to comprehensive base map data, allowing you to tailor the map display to your specific needs.
Multiple pre-designed map styles suited for various application types, such as navigation, logistics, or data visualization.
Generation of static map images for scenarios where interactive maps aren't suitable, such as:
Embedding in emails or documents
Displaying in low-bandwidth environments
Creating printable maps
Enhancing application performance by reducing client-side rendering

member.name: M:Amazon.GeoMaps.IAmazonGeoMaps.GetGlyphsAsync(Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetGlyphsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns the map's glyphs.
member.param: Container for the necessary parameters to execute the GetGlyphs service method.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: The response from the GetGlyphs service method, as returned by GeoMaps.
member.seealso: REST API Reference for GetGlyphs Operation

member.name: M:Amazon.GeoMaps.IAmazonGeoMaps.GetStaticMapAsync(Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetStaticMapRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Provides high-quality static map images with customizable options. You can modify the map's appearance and overlay additional information. It's an ideal solution for applications requiring tailored static map snapshots.
member.param: Container for the necessary parameters to execute the GetStaticMap service method.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.

member.name: M:Amazon.GeoMaps.IAmazonGeoMaps.GetTileAsync(Amazon.GeoMaps.Model.GetTileRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns a tile. Map tiles are used by clients to render a map. they're addressed using a grid arrangement with an X coordinate, Y coordinate, and Z (zoom) level.
member.param: Container for the necessary parameters to execute the GetTile service method.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
